holidays.title: Choiseul Province Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Choiseul Province Day and learn the history behind it!

holidays.title: Day of Liberation and Innovation
holidays.description: We're saying “No!” to oppression and “Yes!” to standing in solidarity with the persecuted.

holidays.title: EDSA Revolution Anniversary
holidays.description: Today we join Filipinos as they remember the activities that led to the restoration of democracy.

holidays.title: International Sword Swallowers Day
holidays.description: Join us as we explore the world of sword swallowing — it’s an intriguing sight to behold.

holidays.title: Introduce A Girl To Engineering Day
holidays.description: Spark curiosity and discover a whole new exciting world on Introduce a Girl to Engineering Day.

holidays.title: Let's All Eat Right Day
holidays.description: Get ready to ponder your relationship with food and journey towards small wins.

holidays.title: National Billy Day
holidays.description: Billy, how much do you know about your name? You’re about to learn a lot more!

holidays.title: National Chocolate Covered Nut Day
holidays.description: Get ready to join us for a chocolaty, crunchy, nutty, and very sweet day!

holidays.title: National Day Kuwait
holidays.description: Kuwait is one of the most prosperous countries in the Gulf, with a rich history.

holidays.title: National Jessica Day
holidays.description: Hey, Jessica. Are you ready to discover who or what inspired your name?

holidays.title: National Kathy Day
holidays.description: It’s the day of the ‘purists’; join us as we celebrate Kathys on their name day.

holidays.title: National Nicholas Day
holidays.description: Join in the celebrations as we give a shout-out to every Nicholas we know!

holidays.title: Open That Bottle Night
holidays.description: Get your corkscrews and glasses ready. It is Open That Bottle Night!

holidays.title: People Power Revolution
holidays.description: We are remembering a powerful revolution with the people of the Philippines.

holidays.title: Pistol Patent Day
holidays.description: Lock and load because it's time to dive deep into the history of pistols!

holidays.title: Quiet Day
holidays.description: It’s the day to maintain pin drop silence. Join us as we learn more about it.

holidays.title: Soviet Occupation Day
holidays.description: Join us as we observe Soviet Occupation Day to commemorate the Red Army Invasion in 1921.

holidays.title: Chelsea Handler’s Birthday
holidays.description: This stand-up comedienne has been making audiences around the world laugh since 1996!

holidays.title: Dutchess Lattimore’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this tattoo artist, there’s an endless supply of memories to imprint.

holidays.title: George Harrison’s Birthday
holidays.description: The multi-talented icon and legend can rest easy knowing he impacted the world with his music.

holidays.title: James Phelps’s Birthday
holidays.description: James Phelps is best known for playing Fred Weasley in the “Harry Potter” film series.

holidays.title: Nick Hounslow’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nick Hounslow has become a role model for many individuals all over the world.

holidays.title: Ric Flair’s Birthday
holidays.description: This world heavyweight champion body-slammed his way to success and has nothing left to prove.
